about_the_game:
Fight against the viruses and cure the entire body!
A fast-paced real-time strategy game of cell conquest.

The Nano War series has already been played by millions of people on the web since 2008.

In Nano War you have to conquer infected territories.
Send your units to capture the other cells and increase your power to defeat the enemies.
It's an intuitive game, user friendly/easy to play, highly addictive and for everyone!

STORY


Once upon a time in a human body. Thousands of nanoscopic cells lived peacefully for many generations.
Among these cells, there is the mother cell, the very first cell and the one that gave birth to all.
Three of the most destructive group of viruses had managed to infect the mother cell.
The mother cell was forced to produce countless infected cells.
But local cells didn't yield and prepared to fight back. We need to defeat all evil and quickly restore balance!!! The Nano War has begun!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac os 10.5 Catalina
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 560
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac os 10.5 Catalina
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 560
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: NanoWar: Cells VS Virus

short_description: Fight against the viruses and cure the entire body! A fast-paced real-time strategy game of cell conquest. Lot of players already got the bug... ready to defend your cells?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
